mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE ID = #{id} and PW = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_TB SET PW = #{newPassword} WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE ATTACHMENT_TB SET SAVE_NAME = #{save_name}, REAL_NAME = #{real_name}, FILE_PATH = #{file_path}, FILE_SIZE = #{file_size}, FILE_EXT = #{file_ext}, REGDATE = sysdate, THUMBNAIL_NAME = #{thumbnail_name} WHERE FK_ID = #{fk_id} and FILE_TYPE = 'member'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_TB (ID, FK_ID, FILE_TYPE, SAVE_NAME, REAL_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, REGDATE,THUMBNAIL_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_ATTACHMENT_ID.nextval, #{fk_id}, #{file_type}, #{save_name},#{real_name},#{file_path},#{file_size},#{file_ext},sysdate,#{thumbnail_name})
mapper.select: SELECT OT.ID,MEMBER_ID, OT.PRODUCT_ID ,OT.ORDER_ID, OT.CARD_NUM , OT.PRODUCT_ID,OT.STATUS ,OT.PRODUCT_NAME ,OT.METHOD_TYPE , OT.PG_TYPE ,OT.PURCHASED_AT, PT.DESCRIPT ,OT.PRICE, AT2.FILE_PATH, AT2.REAL_NAME FROM ORDER_TB OT LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TB PT ON OT.PRODUCT_ID = PT.ID LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT_TB AT2 ON OT.PRODUCT_ID = AT2.FK_ID AND AT2.FILE_TYPE = 'product' WHERE OT.MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND OT.STATUS = 'comp'
